oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Rubinoff and his Violin…, 1938
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A signed concert program from the one night only performance, Rubinoff and his Violin, with piano duo Jacques Fray & Mario Braggiotti presented at the Ryman Auditorium on February 16, 1938. The concert was sponsored by Al Menah Shrine Temple. The Ryman Auditorium is located on Fifth Avenue North in Nashville, Tennessee. After getting his start on the Eddie Cantor Show, celebrated violinist David Rubinoff toured all over the country playing large theatres. Forms part of the Naff Collection. 1 program : col. ; 6.5 x 10 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Rubinoff, Dave, 1897-
Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.)
